title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

An unsupported answer of 0.303 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaiodacaaIWaGaaG4maaaa@3C9C@ (or 0.302 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaiodacaaIWaGaaGOmaaaa@3C9B@ ) does not earn the point.

The correct numerical answer must be accompanied by an appropriate mathematical expression, such as d 2 y d t 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F6D@

The correct symbolic answer accompanied by an appropriate mathematical expression, such as d 2 y d t 2   |  t=3 = 1−sin 3 2 3+cos 3 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@@56CC@ earns the point.

Degree mode: A response that presents answers obtained by using a calculator in degree mode does not earn the first point it would have otherwise earned. The response is generally eligible for all subsequent points (unless no answer is possible in degree mode or the question is made simpler by using degree mode). In degree mode, the answer is 0.25 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaikdacaaI1aaaaa@3BE3@ (or 0.249 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaikdacaaI0aGaaGyoaaaa@3CA5@ ).
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned by reporting x ( 2 )=4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F93@ alone, or as the first coordinate of an ordered pair.

The second point is earned by writing ∫ 0 2 t+cos t   dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48EC@ as part of the expression for y ( 2 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E82@

The second point must be earned to be eligible for the third point, with the exception that a response presenting only the indefinite integral ∫ t+cos t   dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4748@ can earn the third point with a correct value of y ( 2 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E82@

The third point is earned for correctly evaluating the definite integral and adding the initial condition ( y ( 0 )=5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F93@ ). The value may appear alone, or as the second coordinate of an ordered pair, and may be written as “ 5+2.408. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF7@ ”

The position does not have to be written as an ordered pair, but if the position is written as an ordered pair, the x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4baaaa@39F9@ - and y MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5baaaa@39FA@ -coordinates must be in the correct order to earn the third point.

Degree mode: y ( 2 )=7.797 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@428E@ (See degree mode statement in part (a).)
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

A response must clearly indicate “no” or the equivalent and provide an acceptable reason in order to earn the point.

dy dt ≥0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FB3@ is an acceptable reason.

Other acceptable reasons: dy dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D33@ is always positive, or dy dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D33@ is never negative.

The point is not earned with these reasons:

· t+cos t ≠0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4315@ in the interval

· t=− 0.739 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4146@ is not in the interval

· The slope of the curve is positive

· t+cos t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@408A@ is always increasing

· Any appeal to points of inflection
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes the criteria below.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The second point can be earned by the statement dy dx = t+cos t −2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4820@

The second point is not earned if dy dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D37@ is written as dx  /  dt dy  /  dt . MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47FE@ This response is eligible to earn 1-0-1-1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DDB@ in this part.

If the first two points are earned, the third point can be earned (implicitly) with the statement dy dt =2. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FA7@

An answer of 4.352 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI0aGaaiOlaiaaiodacaaI1aGaaGOmaaaa@3CA4@ without any supporting work does not earn the fourth point.

Degree mode: t=3.001 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E99@ (See degree mode statement in part (a).)
